title: [BUG] Xamarin Forms - xunit - Could not load file or assembly 'SkiaSharp.Views.Forms
body:
**Description**

I have a xamarin forms project where I make use of this library in a ContentPage. When I create the ContentPage within a xunit test project (like: new DamagePage()), I get the following error: "Could not load file or assembly 'SkiaSharp.Views.Forms". The error is given when the Initializecomponent method is called in the codebehind of the ContentPage.

I have installed SkiaSharp.Views.Forms and SkySharp.svg in both the xamarin forms project and the test project, why do I still get this error?

**Code**

        <!--Damage view image-->
        <skia:SKCanvasView Grid.Row="0" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand">
            <!-- The Behaviours element binds the canvas to a command responsible for drawing in it. -->
            <skia:SKCanvasView.Behaviors>
                <behaviour:PaintSurfaceCommandBehavior Command="{Binding ShowDamageScreenCommand}" />
            </skia:SKCanvasView.Behaviors>

            <!-- This element is responsible for binding a tap on the screen to opening a new window to set damage.-->
            <skia:SKCanvasView.GestureRecognizers>
                <TapGestureRecognizer Command="{ Binding OpenSetDamageCommand, Mode=TwoWay }" />
            </skia:SKCanvasView.GestureRecognizers>
        </skia:SKCanvasView>

**Expected Behavior**

When I create a the ContentPage from within my test project, I don't want it to fail because of the error.

**Actual Behavior**

When I delete the code in the view, the unit tests passes. When I put the code in there and I run a unit tests which creates the particular contentpage, the error arrises..

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  1.68.1.1
- Last known good version:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
Xamarin Forms
